whoHasAccess: Choose who will have access to this { recordType }
privateAccess: Only you have access to this {recordType}
kaitiakiAccess: Only kaitiaki of this tribe can view this {recordType}
membersCanAccess: Members of this tribe can read this {recordType}. Only Kaitiaki can edit.
membersCanEdit: Members of this tribe can edit this {recordType}
membersCanSubmit: Members of this tribe can submit changes to this {recordType}. Changes are reviewed by Kaitiaki
